response.overview: Inside the prison, Babis meets an old prisoner called "The Godfather", who gives him a plan for a genius robbery. But in order to carry out the plan, he must cooperate with two retired robbers who are in the Nursing Home, Mytoga and Hlebonas. Babis is released from prison and finds the two old men. With the help of a nurse they try to carry out the robbery, which has many unexpected and comical situations in store for them, which finally lead them to a robbery of the plate.
response.title: Kleftronia tis plakas
